name: Overlord Robochan [VR JAM 2021]
description:
This year in only one weekend: the VR JAM 2021 rocks!

Together with Luca we started on Friday afternoon with a topic and lots of ideas. We were quickly able to get enthusiastic about a theme and a rough framework and started with the concept that very evening. The following day, everything was dedicated to the functions. Many bugs were found and the gameplay refined. On the last day, the focus was on the continuous design and filling in the empty spaces. The result: a small adventure game in low-poly style.
